The column names in a Shape file are limited to 10 characters
This lists the short column name and the original column name in the database table
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

COMMENTS = COMMENTS
PREMIUM = PREMIUM
VLINE = VLINE
SEANNOCAD = SE_ANNO_CAD_DATA
INTERSTATE = INTERSTATE
STID_VLINE = STOPID_VLINE
STATUS = STATUS
METRO = METRO
STOPID_MTR = STOPID_METRO
STOP_ZONE = STOP_ZONE
STATION = STATION_NAME
